types.html:
feux de la rampe m pl (plural only)

  1. footlights (stage lights located at the front edge of the stage that illuminates the actors from foot level up)
    être sous les feux de la rampe ― to be in the limelight, to be in the spotlight

title: feux de la rampe
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /fø d(ə) la ʁɑ̃p/
